name: Jet3D
description:
Jet3D is a build-your-own-level platforming game inspired by the 1993 classic Jetpack. 

Build your own custom platforming challenges and puzzles.

Share your creations with friends, family, and the world wide web!

Play levels created by other players!

Grab the gems and make it to the end of the level...if you can! Download today and start building.

Features

  • built-in level-editor
  • easy in-game level sharing using Mod.IO
  • 46 unique building blocks including monsters, upgrades, teleporters and more! 
  • Third-person 3D platforming.  Jet pack included.
  • Color Blind Mode
  • And much, much more!

Minimum Requirements

This game is fairly easy for your computer to run.
Most machines run smoothly at 60fps.
Input: Mouse & Keyboard
Memory: 2 GB
Graphics Card:  Intel HD Graphics 3000
CPU: Intel Core i5-2450M @2.5Ghz
Installed File Size: 125MB
OS: Windows 10 (32-bit is fine)
Screen Resolution: 1366x768
